text: Zisas mba bunin mbe suaŋgia thugap, mbaram za kha buni mbe nzuav khaŋ mbe nzuai, “Fhe Bakɨme Guma Guar zaagi vhɨrve ndirga. Mba gumgi ruu gum, mba Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari gumgir pani, Zudaiŋ tɨvi vhuuiŋ kaŋgi gumgi, mbe zam ana shashagip kɨr ana segɨrga. Mbe ana shogirim, ana rimgirga, ra phuni khegene vhɨzgirga, ana taagi khavgirga.”
